title: 3 Easy Steps to Craft Mossy Cobblestone Blocks in Minecraft

steps.title: Interact with the crafting table.
steps.content: Interact with the crafting table . This will open a 3x3 crafting grid. You can also find and mine Mossy Cobblestone all around the world, such as jungle temples, underwater ruins, pillager outposts, and more.

steps.title: Place the materials in the grid.
steps.content: Place the materials in the grid. Be sure to place them as follows: 1 Cobblestone should be placed in any of the leftmost squares. 1 Vines or 1 Moss Block should be placed in the center square to its right. [1] X Research source Vines grow on walls in jungles, swamps, and lush caves. Moss Blocks can be found in the lush caves biome. Use tools such as shears and a hoe to quickly mine them.

steps.title: Place the Mossy Cobblestone in your inventory.
steps.content: Place the Mossy Cobblestone in your inventory. You can now use the Mossy Cobblestone to build structures, such as Mossy Cobblestone Slabs, Stairs , and even Walls to make a house .
